channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As Trump pushes Supreme Court to uphold his tariffs, he signals trade deals will be defunct if he loses the case: ‘I guess we’d have to unwind them’
item.description: “If we don't win that case, our country is going to suffer so greatly, so greatly,” the president said on Wednesday.

item.title: This CEO Will Not Be Joining Trump’s Tech Dinner Tonight
item.description: Trump will host top tech CEOs at a White House dinner tonight. But one notable name is absent from the guest list.

item.title: Trump’s dinner with tech CEOs at the White House won’t include Musk

item.title: Why good teams beat good ideas

item.title: America’s billionaires are older than ever, with one in five already in their 80s or 90s—as millennials await the Great Wealth Transfer
item.description: There’s a record 36 billionaires over 90. Some are still showing up at the office. Meanwhile, “young” billionaires (under 50) make up just 10% of the ...

item.title: Why Elon Musk’s Weirdly Halting Optimus Robot Just Got Panned on X
item.description: One person wrote: ‘This might literally be the worst humanoid robot demo I have seen!’

item.title: Why We Teach All Employees to Lead, no Matter Their Role
item.description: As an employee-owned company, leadership has to be shared.

item.title: If You’re Using Microsoft Teams, Beware: Hackers Could be Targeting Your Company
item.description: Zoom is affected too. It’s an ideal moment to remind your staff that good cybersecurity is an ongoing discipline, not a one-off issue.

item.title: Frozen vegetables recalled over Listeria fears: Toss these bags of peas and carrots right now

item.title: Authorities raided Streameast’s offices and shut down the largest illegal sports streaming platform that had over 1.6 billion visits in the last year
item.description: The network illegally streamed matches and games from Europe’s Premier League and Champions League, as well as those from the NFL, NBA, and MLB.

item.title: Jobless claims rise and private employers slow down hiring in August

item.title: How Formula 1 Inspires Successful Business Transformation
item.description: Five principles from the fastest teams on the planet to help your company move faster, smarter, and more in sync.

item.title: Trump demands immediate Supreme Court showdown over tariffs, warning of ‘economic catastrophe’ if they don’t remain in place
item.description: The Trump administration says the court’s decision cast “a pall of legal uncertainty over the president’s efforts to protect our country.”

item.title: Tariff instability and a break with China is hitting American companies hard, and homegrown manufacturer John Deere is no exception
item.description: Trump’s tariff policies are hitting John Deere’s customers hard.
